snippet: A Utah truck driver who wore vampire-fang dentures and is charged with sexually abusing and beating two women who he held captive in his vehicle as he traveled the country had four more victims, federal prosecutors have said....

headline.print_headline: Prosecutors Say Vampire-Fanged Utah Trucker Had More Victims
headline.main: Prosecutors Say Vampire-Fanged Utah Trucker Had More Victims

lead_paragraph: A Utah truck driver who wore vampire-fang dentures and is charged with sexually abusing and beating two women who he held captive in his vehicle as he traveled the country had four more victims, federal prosecutors have said.
